title: Inside Training : Warming up for Aston Villa
body_text:
With a trip to Villa Park on the cards this weekend, we’ve been hard at work at London Colney to get ready for Saturday’s game.
A win against Unai Emery’s side would keep us at the top of the Premier League table, but it will be no easy feat against a team who are third in the division, just four points behind us, and having won all 14 home league matches since we last visited their corner of Birmingham back in February.
Press play on the video above to watch how we prepared in a chilly training session this week.
